title: How to Put Waist Length Hair in a Shower Cap

steps.headline: Put your hair in a messy bun.
steps.description: First, take a hair elastic and pull all of your hair through it as if you were putting your hair up into a ponytail. Next, twist the elastic around and pull your hair through it all the way. Finally, twist your hair elastic again and pull your hair through partway. Your messy bun is complete.

steps.headline: Put the palm of your hand on your neck, beneath the messy bun.
steps.description: Then flip your head upside down and use your hand to push the messy bun upside down too.

steps.headline: Put the edge of the shower cap on the nape of your neck.
Stretch the other side of the shower cap over to the top of your forehead where the front of your hair ends.
Adjust the shower cap and tuck any loose ends of hair into the shower cap.
steps.description: To ensure that your shower cap will stay on during your shower, adjust the shower cap so that it is covering your ears.
